lead_paragraph: The Minnesota Vikings had one of the least productive offenses in the league this season, and coach Mike Zimmer clearly wasn't comfortable with the status quo.

headline.print_headline: AP Source: Vikings Hire Pat Shurmur as Assistant Coach
headline.main: AP Source: Vikings Hire Pat Shurmur as Assistant Coach
